title: unable to connect to the server
body: Usually, I  use smartphone wifi to connect the game. But im unable to connect the server even i restart my mac. Anyone get the same problem?

replies.body:
Hey MyloveMyFate,

I'm sorry to hear that you're encountering connection issues to the League of Legends servers. Before we start looking at factors that may be causing these issues, I'd first like to confirm that the issue does not lay on your end of things. Can you try as many solutions as you can that are provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article?

If those solutions don't work, let's start looking into the diagnostics and see where the issue may be originating. To do this, we'll need you to provide some information for us: 

1. Confirmation that you've tried the solutions in the Troubleshooting Connection Issues article
2. ISP that you're using
3. Region and/or State
4. Trace Route (Tracert) - If you're unsure how to do this, check out [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)
5. When did these issues begin occurring, and how often?
6. Additional information you'd like to provide

Thank you for your time.

I can play the game with home internet(wifi) around 38-200 ping. I just don't understand why i cant play with my phone  around 38 ping which is stable (wifi,vodafone),after i updated lol on friday night.
i play oceania server in australia.
Can you attach a Tracert log please?
